tit.j: 十条駅 (京都市営地下鉄)

sen.j: 十条駅（じゅうじょうえき）は、京都府京都市南区_(京都市)にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Minami Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Jujo Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line, a Kyoto Municipal Subway Line.
Located in the Minami ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Jujo Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line, a Kyoto Municipal Subway Line.
Located in the Minami Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Jujo Station is a stop on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway.
sen.cmt: 一部修正"Minami ward"→"Minami Ward"に変更しました。

sen.e: The station number is K13.
The station number is K13.
The station number is K13.

sen.j: 十条通烏丸通交差点の地下に位置する、プラットホーム1面2線の地下駅。
sen.e: It is an underground station with a single platform between tracks and located underground of Jujo Karasumaru-dori Street crossing.
It's an underground station with a single platform between tracks, located underground below Jujo Karasumaru-dori Street crossing.
It's an underground station with a single platform between tracks, located underground below Jujo-Karasuma crossing.
Ticket gates are installed at only one place.
Ticket gates are found in just one location.
Ticket gates are found in just one location.

sen.j: 16系統：九条車庫行／（東寺経由）京都駅行
sen.e: Route No.16: For Kujo Shako depot/Kyoto Station (via To-ji Temple)
Route No.16: For Kujo Shako depot/Kyoto Station (via To-ji Temple)

sen.j: 84系統：京都外国語大学行／（久世橋通経由）京都駅八条口アバンティ前行
sen.e: Route No.84: For Kyoto University of Foreign Studies/Kyotoeki- Hachijoguchi Avanti-mae

Route No. 84: For Kyoto University of Foreign Studies/Kyoto Station Hachijo Exit Avanti-mae (via Kuzebashi-dori Street)
sen.cmt: Kyoto Stationとしました。Hachijo Exit としました。Kuzebashi-dori Street追加

sen.j: 1988年6月11日 烏丸線京都～竹田間延伸時に開業。
sen.e: Opened on June 11, 1988 coincidental with the extension of the Karasuma Line between Kyoto Station and Takeda Station.
It opened on June 11, 1988, concurrently with the extension of the Karasuma Line between Kyoto Station and Takeda Station.
June 11, 1988: The station opened concurrently with the extension of the Karasuma Line between Kyoto Station and Takeda Station.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: Use of PiTaPa Cards commenced on April 1, 2007.
The use of PiTaPa cards commenced on April 1, 2007.
April 1, 2007: The use of PiTaPa cards commenced.
